description: Formerly called “brewtruc,” Brewtruck is the world’s first mobile taproom and beer lounge, capable of serving up to 6 varieties of artisanal craft brew from 6 full-sized kegs housed in a subfloor keg fridge.This 40 foot custom-converted bus features a copper and walnut bar, spacious interior with overhead skylights, and leather-upholstered bench seating for 20 passengers. Also boasting exterior taps, Brewtruck is an amazing option for all your event needs!To read about a sweet ride in this sweet ride, and why Brewtruck is the best party this side of the Bay, check out Roaming Hunger's blog post here: http://roaminghunger.com/blog/8191/the-brewtruck-a-mobile-tap-room
name: brewtruck sf
